column3: Tommy Thornton... don’t know him, but wish I could ride with him. As always... well done Rapha.

I was lucky enough to ride with him a few months ago up a climb... I couldn’t have asked for better guidance and tips... he’s right, climbing up a 17% grade doesn’t get easier, but you do get faster. Lol
BRO!  They did this video right. Thanks, Rapha.
